# R package `IPBES.R` containing utility and tool functions by the [IPBES](https://ipbes.net) [Data and Knowldege TSU](https://www.ipbes.net/data-management)

## Important

This package is for internal usage. Thewrefore function definitions can
change without prior notice.

We try to limit this, but it can not be guaranteed.

## News

### v0.2.9

#### added feature

- add argument to
  [`plot_snowball_interactive()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/plot_snowball_interactive.md)
  to allow for saving of the html widget with the interactive graph

#### bugfix

- forgotten local variable

### v0.2.8

#### bugfix

- missing dependency (import)

### v0.2.7

#### added feature

- adds interactive graphing function

### v0.2.4

#### change

- Change return value from vector to named vector with ids as names

### v0.2.3

#### added feature

- Addition of
  [`abbreviate_authors()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/abbreviate_authors.md)
  function

# Package index

## All functions

- [`IPBES.R-package`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/IPBES.R-package.md)
  [`IPBES.R`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/IPBES.R-package.md)
  : Tool functions used by the Data and Knowledge Technical Support Unit
  of IPBES
- [`abbreviate_authors()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/abbreviate_authors.md)
  : Abbreviate Authors
- [`doi_exists()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/doi_exists.md)
  : Check if DOIs exist
- [`doi_not_retracted()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/doi_not_retracted.md)
  : Check if DOIs are not retracted
- [`doi_valid()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/doi_valid.md)
  : Validate DOIs
- [`get_count()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/get_count.md)
  : Get Count
- [`map_country_codes()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/map_country_codes.md)
  : Draw Map Map of Country Codes
- [`oa_request_IPBES()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/oa_request_IPBES.md)
  : Get bibliographic records from OpenAlex database
- [`plot_snowball()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/plot_snowball.md)
  : Plot Snowball
- [`plot_snowball_interactive()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/plot_snowball_interactive.md)
  : Plot an Interactive Citation Network from a Snowball Search
- [`table_dt()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/table_dt.md)
  : Create a DataTable with various export options
- [`to_xlsx()`](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES.R/reference/to_xlsx.md)
  : Convert Snowball to XLSX
